ygData.subject: RE: what an arse.....
ygData.msgSnippet: All bow before the greatness of Verant s random number generator.... Tailoring is also this way, attempted 30 pieces of cured, gained 1 skill point.  Attempted
ygData.messageBody:
All bow before the greatness of Verant's random number generator....
Tailoring is also this way, attempted 30 pieces of cured, gained 1 skill
point. Attempted 4 pieces later that nite, gained 3 skill points.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: FiZZleClick [mailto:clonelord@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 2:38 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] what an arse.....


From: "FiZZleClick" <clonelord@...>

Tinkering seems to be like swimming. Sometime you can spend hours on it and
it don't go up, then it will go up 4 points in 3 mins. Go figgure.

Thaandar on Soulsek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Sonny Nguyen <snguyen@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, 1 December 1999 3:18
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] what an arse.....


>From: Sonny Nguyen <snguyen@...>
>
>What an ass of him. Your typical Egotistic greedy SoB harvester. okie
sorry.
>having bad day. had to let it out.
>
>wasted 500pp & still at 89. just isnt my day today. does anyone here have
>bad days & good days at tinkering. some days the skill points just keep on
>rolling & some days they dont show up? =(
>
>Bastin Tinkerhad, <Days of Dour>
>47th Gnome Wiz
>-The Rathe
>
>
>Message: 6
> Date: Mon, 29 Nov 1999 11:49:34 -0800 (PST)
> From: Brad Balatgek <gazamel@...>
>Subject: Re: A tale of woe.
>
>There's a gnome on our server, Mauldoon, who has a
>skill of 172. He raised his skill up by harvesting
>the coral mesh from sharks (lvl 20ish) in the OOT. He
>never shared the information with anyone. Now the
>mobs stopped dropping the items, and he's got a lock
>on our market. He also knows the location of diamond
>dust, but refuses to tell anyone where it is.
>
>Pretty cool guy, eh? He once told me that he'd tell
>me where diamond dust was if I got him twinked to
>level 39. Nope, not worth it to me.
>
>So, if you all want to complain about tinkering to
>someone, let Mauldoon, from Solusek Ro, know how you
>feel. Be forewarned that his ego is about the size of
>Long Island. He gets a /rude everytime I see him.
>
>Gazamel Prime
>Solusek Ro
>50th Gnome Warrior
>_
>
>
